head.title: Bacon and Eggs - Candy Fun Treats !!

directions.step:
Drop melted chocolate onto wax paper. Put on yellow M & M's for yolks. Serve with pretzel sticks for bacon. Serves up alot of fun with the kids!
Recipe by: Key Gourmet
Posted to recipelu-digest by James and Susan Kirkland <kirkland@gj.net> on Feb 16, 1998
